critique: The document expresses concern and determination to resolve an unlawful work stoppage affecting postal services. It conveys a sense of urgency and the need to restore order. The emotions identified are sadness (due to the disruption), fear (regarding the national concern), and disgust (towards the unlawful activity). There's also a hint of surprise at the unexpected nature of the work stoppage. Joy is not present. The intensity levels are assigned based on the severity of the situation described in the document.
